name: Add-Just (only one variable)
description:
You are a gamedesigner. Do, what all gamedesigners do, to complete the level:

Adjust ONLY ONE variable.

-----------Controls-----------

Use your mouse wheel to scroll. You can change the values of the game but they are all connected

A: Left, D: Right

Space: Jump (You can change direction mid jump, but you will lose momentum)

Goal: Get to the golden thing, any way possible and have fun!
